title: Elimination round of Section B of Group 2 starts on November 29
description: The much-awaited elimination round for Section B of Group 2 kicks off on November 29. Get ready to showcase your skills and progress to the finals!

title: Schedule for Debate Eng, Arb, Urd are out now
description: Check out the latest schedules for the debates in English, Arabic, and Urdu languages. Make sure to prepare and stay updated with the timings.

title: Cluster wise writing programs (Y Category) Postponed to Dec 15
description: The writing programs for Y Category clusters have been postponed to December 15. Utilize this extra time to enhance your writing submissions.
